title: Minna Atsumare! Falcom Gakuen SC Special
synopsis: An episode of Minna Atsumare! Falcom Gakuen SC that acts as an advertisement for a related Minna Atsumare! Falcom Gakuen SC game, aired in Minna Atsumare! Falcom Gakuen SC's regular time slot a week after episode 12.
staff: [['Falcom Sound Team J.D.K', ['Theme Song Composition', ' Music']], ['Arakubo, Daisuke', ['Original Creator']]]
